alert.note: Alert for Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 02 at 6:49AM MST until February 02 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. * WHERE...Tooele and Rush Valleys and Salt Lake Valley. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...UDOT is asking Wasatch Front drivers to delay travel if possible this morning. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys
